document_data.mainbody:
Defender greataxes were rare enchanted weapons imbued with offensive and defensive magics, found in the Western Heartlands circa the late 15 century DR.
A typical defender greataxes possessed a +2 enchantment that guided the axe towards its intended targets and increased its damage. Its defensive magic allowed the wielder decreased the weapons enchantment to +1 and turn it into a magical boost to their defense.
In the , a defender greataxe was in stock among the Harper quartermaster Tallis goods during her time accompanying the Harper hero Jaheira into the deadly Shadow-cursed Lands that swallowed the Moonrise Towers.
